Articles.Content: I have been offline for about 3 weeks so today I checked for updates before playing. The program found an update so I installed it and started the program. Now when I play, every part that I have is doubled. Yes, I am showing two of every part. For most of them 1 of the parts is greyed out so it cannot be selected. For others both of the parts are greyed out and I cannot select either. What is going on? If this is unclear then watch the video below, it is very short.

The parts in 0.25 had their .cfg files renamed and the patcher doesn't correctly handle it. Either download a full fresh copy of 0.25 or delete the Squad and NASAMission folders from GameData and run the patcher again. Both of these will require a substantial download.

You may also be able to search the Squad and NASAMission folders for files called part.cfg and delete them and then run the patcher (which should require a smaller download) but this may not work reliably.

If you have saves you want to keep then make sure you back them up somewhere first.

The parts in 0.25 had their .cfg files renamed and the patcher doesn't correctly handle it. Delete the Squad and NASAMission folders from GameData and run the patcher again. This will require a substantial download.

Thanks for the help, I had this issue in all of my saves and now the problem is gone! Now to fix the million glitches in my modded save...
My saves were still very early on in the game and I haven't played it for a while so I just did a complete reinstall and fixed the problem. Thanks for the help though.
Is there a way for one to force an update through Steam without deleting the entire program?
